job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: pstronguSite ReliabilitynbspEngineerustrongppnbspppExcellent opportunity to be part of this high growth business unit transforming on premise applications to Google Cloud PlatformnbspppnbspppYou will work with a dedicated team to design configure deploy and support enterprise applications to GCP in a large data intensive environmentnbspppnbspppstrongRESPONSIBILITIESstrongnbsppulliWork with business and IT team to transform enterprise applications from on prem to GCPliliDesign configure deploy and triage applications into productionliliCode deployment utilizing terraformliliCICDnbspliliWrite scripts performance monitoringliliSupport and on call dutiesnbspliliDocument new processesliulpbrppThis is an excellent 6 month contract opportunity working withnbspa high growth business unit as they transform to GCP Outstanding opportunity to learn and grow your skills in a team that is seeking innovation in product and technology Potential for conversion to full time employment Ideally in Saint Louis or Atlanta but you can work 100 remotelynbspppnbspppstrongREQUIRED SKILLSstrongpulli5 years as an SRE  Site Reliability EngineernbspliliGCP  1 year  experience deploying code to cloud platformsliliExperience deployingsupporting NetC applicationsnbspliliWindowsnbspand related scripting skills in PowerShell Python or BashliliKnowledge of CICD Jenkins pipelinesliliExcellent troubleshooting skills and a problemsolver mindsetliulpnbspnbspppstrongPREFERRED SKILLSstrongpulliKubernetes  certificationsnbspliliGKEnbspliliAppDynamicsnbspnbspliulpnbspp
